Client.View

Class FrameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client.View.FrameManager

  • public class FrameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing the display windows in the program. It creates each window in the application, assigns actionListeners and manages the messages to be displayed by each window.
    Author:
    Michael Vassilev 30068475, Vic Phan 30061885, Sebastian Contreras 30062418s
